title: Cat Photo App
description: In this project, I learned the most common HTML tags by building my own cat photo app.

title: Cafe Menu
description: In this project, I learned how to use CSS to set the color, font, size, and other aspects of HTML elements.

title: Colored Markers
description: In this project, I learned different ways to set color values and how to pair colors with each other.

title: Registration Form
description: In this project, I learned how to control what types of data people can type into a form, and some new CSS tools for styling pages.

title: Survey Form
description: In this project, I built a survey form to collect data from users.

title: Rothko Painting
description: In this project, I used CSS and the Box Model to create my own Rothko-style rectangular art pieces.

title: Flexbox Photo Gallery
description: In this project, I used Flexbox to build a responsive photo gallery webpage.

title: Nutrition Label
description: In this project, I learned how to style text, adjust line height, and position your text using CSS.

title: Quiz
description: In this project, I learned accessibility tools such as keyboard shortcuts, ARIA attributes, and design best practices.

title: Tribute Page
description: In this project, I built a tribute page for Dr. Norman Borlaug.

title: Balance Sheet
description: In this project, I learned how to change the style of an element when you hover over it with your mouse, and trigger other events on your webpage.

title: Cat Painting
description: In this project, I learned about working with absolute positioning, the z-index property, and the transform property.

title: Piano
description: In this project, I learned more about media queries and pseudo selectors.

title: Technical Documentation Page
description: In this project, I created a technical documentation page to serve as intruction or reference for a topic.

title: City Skyline
description: In this project, I learned how to configure CSS variables so you can reuse them whenever you want.

title: Magazine
description: In this project, I learned how to use CSS Grid, including concepts like grid rows and grid columns.

title: Product Landing Page
description: In this project, I built a product landing page to market a product.

title: Ferris Wheel
description: In this project, I learned how to use CSS to animate elements, transform them, and adjust their speed.

title: Penguin
description: In this project, I used CSS transforms to position and resize the parts of your penguin, create a background, and animate your work.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: In this project, I built my own personal portfolio page.

title: Role Playing Game
description: In this project, I learned how to work with arrays, strings, objects, functions, loops, if/else statements, and more.

title: Calorie Counter
description: In this project, I learned basic regular expressions, template literals, the addEventListener() method, and more.

title: Music Player
description: In this project, I learned fundamental concepts such as handling audio playback, managing a playlist, implementing play, pause, next, previous, and shuffle functionalities.

title: Date Formatter
description: In this project, I learned how to work with the JavaScript Date object, including its methods and properties.

title: Football Team Cards
description: In this project, I learned how to work with DOM manipulation, object destructuring, event handling, and data filtering.

title: Todo App
description: In this project, I learned how to handle form inputs, manage local storage, perform CRUD operations on tasks, implement event listeners, and toggle UI elements.

title: fCC Authors Page
description: In this project, I learned how to use the fetch method, then dynamically update the DOM to display the fetched data.

title: Number Sorter
description: In this project, I learned how to implement and visualize different sorting algorithms
